item.title: Prime numbers
item.description: This is my sieve of Eratosthenes. Well, it's not mine and Eratosthenes' at the same time. It rather belongs to Eratosthenes more, since he thought of it first. I guess I just like it so much that subconsciously I claimed his idea. And how fast is it?
